titleStmt.title: A Collection of twenty four songs written by several hands, and set by several masters of musick ; vvith the tunes engraven on copper-plates with great care : most of them within the compass of a flute.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by F. Leach, for Charles Corbet, and published by W. Davis ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
